1.0.0.0.name: connect20/Cybage_Catalag_Visibility
1.0.0.0.description:
Administrator can use the Catalogue Visibility plug-in to set visibility for different user groups at a product category as well as a product level. 
For example, one user can access a certain product category but other cannot. The plug-in is used to define which user groups would have access to certain categories and its mapped products.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
